attributes.html:
Challenges of Traditional Print Comics

Print comics require artists

  • ...to self-publish or sign up with a publisher
  • ...partake in print-focussed marketing
  • ...partake in the oftentimes long-winded publishing process
attributes.content:
## Challenges of Traditional Print Comics

Print comics require artists

  • ...to self-publish or sign up with a publisher
  • ...partake in print-focussed marketing
  • ...partake in the oftentimes long-winded publishing process
